9    */
10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options;
11  
12  import java.beans.PropertyChangeListener;
13  import java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport;
14  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
15  
16  import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;
17  import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;
18  
19  import org.netbeans.spi.options.OptionsPanelController;
20  import org.openide.util.HelpCtx;
21  import org.openide.util.Lookup;
22  import org.openide.util.NbPreferences;
23  import org.openide.util.WeakListeners;
24  
25  /**
26   * {@link OptionsPanelController} implementation for the {@link ExternalFormatterPanel}.
27   *
28   * @author markiewb
29   */
30  @OptionsPanelController.SubRegistration(id = "de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options", location = "Java", displayName = "#AdvancedOption_DisplayName_ExternalFormatter", keywords = "#AdvancedOption_Keywords_ExternalFormatter", keywordsCategory = "Java/ExternalFormatter")
31  @org.openide.util.NbBundle.Messages({ "AdvancedOption_DisplayName_ExternalFormatter=External Formatter", "AdvancedOption_Keywords_ExternalFormatter=External Formatter" })
32  public final class ExternalFormatterOptionsPanelController extends OptionsPanelController implements ChangeListener {
33  	/** Holder of the {@link ExternalFormatterPanel}. */
34  	private ExternalFormatterPanel panel;
35  
36  	/** Holder of the {@link PropertyChangeSupport}. */
37  	private final PropertyChangeSupport pcs = new PropertyChangeSupport(this);
38  
39  	/** Flag which determines if options were changed. */
40  	private boolean changed;
41  
42  	/**
43  	 * {@inheritDoc}
44  	 */
45  	@Override
46  	public void update() {
47  		createOrGetPanel().load();
48  		changed = false;
49  	}
50  
51  	/**
52  	 * {@inheritDoc}
53  	 */
54  	@Override
55  	public void applyChanges() {
56  		createOrGetPanel().store();
57  		changed = false;
58  	}
59  
60  	/**
61  	 * {@inheritDoc}
62  	 */
63  	@Override
64  	public void cancel() {
65  		// need not do anything special, if no changes have been persisted yet
66  	}
67  
68  	/**
69  	 * {@inheritDoc}
70  	 */
71  	@Override
72  	public boolean isValid() {
73  		return createOrGetPanel().valid();
74  	}
75  
76  	/**
77  	 * {@inheritDoc}
78  	 */
79  	@Override
80  	public boolean isChanged() {
81  		return changed;
82  	}
83  
84  	/**
85  	 * {@inheritDoc}
86  	 */
87  	@Override
88  	public HelpCtx getHelpCtx() {
89  		return null;
90  	}
91  
92  	/**
93  	 * {@inheritDoc}
94  	 */
95  	@Override
96  	public ExternalFormatterPanel getComponent(Lookup masterLookup) {
97  		return createOrGetPanel();
98  	}
99  
100 	/**
101 	 * Returns the cached {@link ExternalFormatterPanel} or creates a new one and caches it for the next call.
102 	 *
103 	 * @return the cached {@link ExternalFormatterPanel} or creates a new one and caches it for the next call
104 	 */
105 	private ExternalFormatterPanel createOrGetPanel() {
106 		if (null == panel) {
107 			Preferences globalPreferences = NbPreferences.forModule(ExternalFormatterPanel.class);
108 			panel = new ExternalFormatterPanel(globalPreferences, false);
109 			panel.addChangeListener(WeakListeners.change(this, panel));
110 		}
111 
112 		return panel;
113 	}
114 
115 	/**
116 	 * {@inheritDoc}
117 	 */
118 	@Override
119 	public void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l) {
120 		pcs.addPropertyChangeListener(l);
121 	}
122 
123 	/**
124 	 * {@inheritDoc}
125 	 */
126 	@Override
127 	public void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l) {
128 		pcs.removePropertyChangeListener(l);
129 	}
130 
131 	/**
132 	 * {@inheritDoc}
133 	 */
134 	@Override
135 	public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
136 		if (!changed) {
137 			changed = true;
138 			pcs.firePropertyChange(OptionsPanelController.PROP_CHANGED, false, true);
139 		}
140 
141 		pcs.firePropertyChange(OptionsPanelController.PROP_VALID, null, null);
142 	}
143 }
